text: On 17 July 2019 ten tribals were gunned down in Ghorawal, Sonbhadra, Uttar Pradesh over a land dispute. The following day, the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes Commission of Uttar Pradesh asked the state government to invoke Gangster Act against the accused. ==References== Category:Sonbhadra district Category:Massacres in India
title: Sonbhadra massacre
